WriterProxy.name: CGNSWriter
WriterProxy.label: CGNS Writer

Documentation.short_help: Write a dataset in CGNS format.
Documentation.long_help: Write files stored in CGNS format.

WriterProxy.Documentation: The CGNS writer writes files stored in CGNS format. The file extension is .cgns. The input of this reader is a structured grid, polygon data, unstructured grid or a multi-block dataset containing these data types.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseHDF5
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When UseHDF5 is turned ON, the CGNS file will use HDF5 as the underlying file format. When turned OFF, the file will use ADF as the underlying file format. HDF5 is preferred and default.
